attributes.action: Stop national insurance hike and ask the general public to vote on this.
attributes.additional_details: Because we have had to pay more in bills this year alone and wages does not increase as much as the government like to think.
attributes.background: Not to make national insurance go up for the working class. Tax millionaires or billionaires

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give a referendum for the public to vote if National Insurance can be increased: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596584

No to any National Insurance increase to ‘fund’ social care: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596514

Limit National Insurance increases to high earners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596280
